languages.text: "Если бы остальные мон-кай были хоть в половину похожи на тебя, {name}... Быть может... однажды бы хрупкий мир между нашими видами все-таки воцарился".

traits.locale_text: "Если бы остальные мон-кай были хоть в половину похожи на тебя, {name}... Быть может... однажды бы хрупкий мир между нашими видами все-таки воцарился".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."
languages.original_text: "Если бы остальные мон-кай были хоть в половину похожи на тебя, {name}... Быть может... однажды бы хрупкий мир между нашими видами все-таки воцарился".

traits.locale_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half like you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."

traits.locale_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Si tous les mon-keigh avaient ne serait-ce que la moitié de votre valeur, {name}... alors, peut-être... l'espoir d'une paix fragile entre nos espèces pourrait naître. »
languages.original_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."

traits.locale_text: « Si tous les mon-keigh avaient ne serait-ce que la moitié de votre valeur, {name}... alors, peut-être... l'espoir d'une paix fragile entre nos espèces pourrait naître. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “别的猴子若是能有你一半那么好，{name}……说不定……我们两个种族之间，有朝一日会实现脆弱的和平。”
languages.original_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."

traits.locale_text: “别的猴子若是能有你一半那么好，{name}……说不定……我们两个种族之间，有朝一日会实现脆弱的和平。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Wären die anderen Chem-Pan-Sey nur ein wenig wie Ihr, {name} ... Vielleicht ... vielleicht könnte dann eines Tages ein fragiler Frieden zwischen unseren Spezies möglich sein."
languages.original_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."

traits.locale_text: "Wären die anderen Chem-Pan-Sey nur ein wenig wie Ihr, {name} ... Vielleicht ... vielleicht könnte dann eines Tages ein fragiler Frieden zwischen unseren Spezies möglich sein."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Si el resto de los mon-keigh fueran la mitad de sensatos que tú, {name}... Posiblemente... Podríamos llegar a un estado de paz entre nuestras especies».
languages.original_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."

traits.locale_text: «Si el resto de los mon-keigh fueran la mitad de sensatos que tú, {name}... Posiblemente... Podríamos llegar a un estado de paz entre nuestras especies».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「他のモン＝ケイがあなたのような考えの半分でも持っていれば{name}…おそらく…いつか種族間にささやかな平和がもたらされるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."

traits.locale_text: 「他のモン＝ケイがあなたのような考えの半分でも持っていれば{name}…おそらく…いつか種族間にささやかな平和がもたらされるかもしれません」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Diğer mon-keighler bir nebze dahi senin gibi olsaydı {name}... Belki günün birinde türlerimiz arasında kırılgan bir sulh hâli korunabilirdi."
languages.original_text: "Were the other mon-keigh even half the likes of you, {name}... Perhaps... A fragile peace between our species could one day become possible."
